Name: Frühe Französische Lieder
Notes: 18 Lieder mit französischen Texten eingerichtet als spielpraktische Ausgabe für Singstimme und Gitarre von Ulrike Merk. Enthält einen Revisionsbericht mit notwendigen Korrekturen des Originaltexts und Erläuterungen zur Einrichtung des Gitarrensatzes.
Long Description: Fanny Hensel composed these 18 songs with French texts between the ages of 15 and 17. The songs are based on stories and novels by Jean Pierre Claris de Florian, popular in Germany at the time. Ulrike Merk has transcribed these songs from the manuscript, arranging them for voice and guitar, and provided fingerings for the guitar. The edition includes a revision report detailing necessary corrections to the original text and the approach to arranging the guitar part. Some songs are set in Moorish-occupied Spain, the cradle of the classical guitar, or feature protagonists accompanying themselves with the guitar, with themes of innocence and purity. Fanny Hensel set these songs in a light style, even imitating specific guitar techniques like rasgueado in the piano part of 'Sérénade de Cortez'.
Short Description: A collection of 18 songs with French texts composed by Fanny Hensel, arranged for voice and guitar by Ulrike Merk.
